Class NavigationListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter
      • eu.focusnet.app.ui.common.NavigationListAdapter

  • public class NavigationListAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
    List Adapter used by the drawer menu and the listings of objects.

      • listItems

        private java.util.ArrayList<SimpleListItem> listItems
        List of items to include in the list. These are SimpleListItems (for header and dummy empty list item) or FeaturedListItem (for links).
